info.title: Next Reason IDP API
info.description: Manage all the Next Reason IDP API endpoints

post.description:
Creates a new profile for the user.
Verification link will be sent via email, or code via SMS,
upon successful registration (based on authentication type).

Grants access for the user. Can login via email, or primary
mobile number, based on authentication type.

Generates JWT tokens, for use in other endpoints, and process.
Depending on the grant type, this accepts either authorization code,
refresh token, or pin (for SMS).

Used for password reset request, if user forgot their password.
A reset link is sent via email, or code via SMS
(based on authentication type).

Sends an invite to a user (create a user without a password).
Verification link will be sent via email, or code via SMS,
upon successful registration (based on authentication type).

get.description:
Gets user's profile.
Uses access token to process information to return.

parameters.description: Client set up for relying party

schema.title: Client set up for relying party
schema.description: Client set up for relying party

parameters.name: client_id

put.description:
Updates user's profile.
Uses access token to process the update.

post.description:
Resends verification link/code to the user, if previous verification
expired, or is now invalid.
Verification link will be sent via email, or code via SMS
(based on authentication type).

Changes the password of a user (for password change, or password reset actions).
Uses access token to process the change.

get.description:
Finds all users in an entity type according to
specified criteria.

put.description:
Directly updates user information. Only modifies attributes
specified in the request.

post.description:
Updates the user's legal acceptance version, based on the latest version
indicated in the client settings.
